company_info.Company Description: DYNAMIC FINANCIAL SERVICES (DFS in short), engaged in financial consultancy since the year 2000 in various fields like Home Loans, Personal Loans, Mortgage Loans, Projects Financing etc., We have sourced loans for various banks like ICICI Bank, Standard Chartered Bank Punjab National Bank, and many other banks. We have also worked towards getting approval for project of builders and marketing for them. We have also sourced mortgage business for India Bulls, Reliance Capitals, Bajaj Auto Finance Ltd.
